plugin.name: Assimp
plugin.author: marc@coppeliarobotics.com
plugin.description: Plugin for importing CAD files in V-REP

item.name: auto
item.description: The up vector is automatically picked

item.name: z
item.description: The up vector is along the file's Z-coordinate

item.name: y
item.description: The up vector is along the file's Y-coordinate

command.name: importShapes
command.description: Imports the specified files as shapes

param.name: maxTextureSize
param.description: The desired maximum texture size (textures will be scaled)

param.name: scaling
param.description: The desired mesh scaling. 0.0 for automatic scaling

param.name: options
param.description: Import flags (1=drop textures, 2=ignore colors, 4=ignore transparency, 8=do not optimize meshes, 16=keep identical vertices, 32=generate one shape per file, 64=shapes have aligned orientations, 128=ignore up vector coded in fileformat (e.g. Collada), 256=silent)

command.name: exportShapes
command.description: Exports the specified shapes. Depending on the fileformat, several files will be created (e.g. myFile.obj, myFile.mtl, myFile_2180010.png, etc.)

param.name: shapeHandles
param.description: The handles of the shapes to export

command.name: getImportFormat
command.description: Allows to loop through supported file formats for import

param.name: formatDescription
param.description: The description of the file format at the specified index, or an empty string

param.name: formatExtension
param.description: The file extension of the file format at the specified index, or an empty string

command.name: getExportFormat
command.description: Allows to loop through supported file formats for export

param.name: formatDescription
param.description: The description of the file format at the specified index, or an empty string

param.name: formatExtension
param.description: The file extension of the file format at the specified index, or an empty string

param.name: formatId
param.description: The file format ID at the specified index (needed when exporting), or an empty string

command.name: importMeshes
command.description: Imports the specified files as mesh data

param.name: scaling
param.description: The desired mesh scaling. 0.0 for automatic scaling

param.name: options
param.description: Import flags (8=do not optimize meshes, 16=keep inditical vertices, 32=one mesh per file, 128=ignore up vector coded in fileformat (e.g. Collada), 256=silent)

param.name: allVertices
param.description: A table containing tables of vertices (one table entry per mesh)

param.name: allIndices
param.description: A table containing tables of indices (one table entry per mesh)

param.name: allVertices
param.description: A table containing tables of vertices (one table entry per mesh)

param.name: allIndices
param.description: A table containing tables of indices (one table entry per mesh)
